data.text: @KOCOAbigail I feel for his family, but he made the choice not to get vaccinated, so I don’t have sympathy for him.
@JKirschenman @KOCOAbigail Thinking the same. Incredibly sad to lose a life especially if preventative measures weren’t taken.
@KOCOAbigail I bet $20 he wasn't vaccinated.  It's sad to see a police officer die, but how can a fit, healthy, fully vaccinated person succumb to a preventable illness?
